title.native: 逆転裁判 その『真実』、異議あり！

description:
Adapted from the popular video game franchise, Ace Attorney follows rookie lawyer Naruhodo Ryuuichi (Phoenix Wright) and his assistant Mayoi (Maya) as he defends his clients in a court of law. With limited evidence and logic as his only weapon, can Naruhodo turn the case around when all the odds are stacked against him?

(Source: Crunchyroll)

tags.name: Crime
tags.description: Centers around unlawful activities punishable by the state or other authority.

tags.name: Primarily Adult Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of characters above a high school age.

tags.description: Centers around the life and activities of law enforcement officers.

tags.description: Prominently features comedy based on deliberately clumsy actions or embarrassing events.

tags.description: Features a character who investigates and solves crimes.

tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a ghost.

tags.description: Centers around characters who murder people as a profession.

tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a shrine maiden.

tags.name: Fugitive
tags.description: Prominently features a character evading capture by an individual or organization.

node.description:
[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E6%B8%A1%E8%BE%BA%E6%AD%A9)

Ayumu Watanabe is a director, screenwriter, storyboard artist and a former animator.
He is a professional screenwriter for anime, drama and theater and is a member of the Writers Guild of Japan.

[Website](http://www.kaoru-wada.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kaoru_wadash) | [Spotify](https://open.spotify.com/artist/4zbQfESCpBlXi1XlpnlG95)

He is a Japanese music composer. Married to voice actress [Akiko Nakagawa](https://anilist.co/staff/95749/Akiko-Nakagawa).

Capcom began in Japan in 1979 as a manufacturer and distributor of electronic game machines. In 1983 Capcom Co., LTD was founded and soon built a reputation for introducing cutting-edge technology and software to the video game market.  Building on its origins as a game machine manufacturer, Capcom is now involved in all areas of the video game industry and has offices in Tokyo, Osaka, California, England, Germany, and Hong Kong.
Joined Audio Planning U in 1982, where he studied under [Yasuo Urakami](https://anilist.co/staff/111277/).

**Birthplace:** North Carolina, US

__[Website](https://www.yasudarei.net/) | [Blog](http://ameblo.jp/yasudarei/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/yasudarei) [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/yasudareiofficial)__

__Rei Yasuda__ is a Japanese-American born vocalist and lyricist under record label SME Records (2013–). She made her initial debut in July 2013 with the single Best of my Love.

name.native: 東京パフォーマンスドール

node.description:
Tokyo Performance Doll, also called TPD or Paadoru (パードル), was a Japanese idol dance pop group from 1990 to 1996.
It had seven main members and several other trainees for live performances, a formula later followed by Hello! Project and AKB48.
TPD was based in Tokyo, and launched sister-bands in other cities: Osaka Performance Doll in 1993 and Shanghai Performance Doll in 1996.
TPD had numerous sub-groups that issued their own singles, while albums were issued collectively.

In June 2013, it has been announced that after 17 years, the group is being revived with an all new line up.

(Source: Wikipedia)
**Tomonori Ochikoshi** is a Japanese producer. He is affiliated with studio A-1 Pictures.
**Tomonori Ochikoshi** is a Japanese producer. He is affiliated with studio A-1 Pictures.
Video Game designer at Capcom and creator of Ace Attorney, Ghost Trick and Dino Crisis.
